questions.question:
Mia was smart, funny, and had a _____ that could make teachers
forgive almost anything—almost.

The day everything went wrong at _____ high
once upon a time at sunshine high school, there was a girl named mia.

It all started on a monday _____ when mia’s
alarm didn’t ring.

She was
known for two things: her endless curiosity and her _____ to get into trouble without
even trying.

She rushed through breakfast, wore two different socks, and
somehow brushed her hair with a pen instead of a _____.
